mdRecord.dcterms:title: Penicillin sensitivity discs

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Label reads: "10 units of Sensi-Discs for lab diagnosis only; Lot 910026; Expiration date 1960-04; Baltimore Biological Laboratory. A division of Becton, Dickinson, and Co. Baltimore 18, MD, U.S.A."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
